txt.en:
Hullo friend, 

While performing his duties here at Hengstacer Farms my stablehand, Cam, found the beast of burden you had been riding. I wanted to assure you that the horse is alive and well. I also wanted to send along an offer to you.

Take the time to read the attached letter, there are directions to the farm from Bree and an offer that I think you may find appealing. 

Thank you for taking good care with my goods.

Éogar
